Reviews.Title: Decent  point and shoot camera
Reviews.Author: Seball
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying the use of this camera. To appreciate the value of this item, you have to acknowledge its limitations which are the same as any budget friendly camera. It will not produce SLR photos; however, it does produce pictures that are as good as any point and shoot compact camera. It rendered excellent outdoor photos, still and sport. The indoor photos were good. I did adjust some settings to get the results that I desired, but it was super easy. The camera is very user friendly. If you approach your purchase of this camera with a realistic expectation of its capabilities, you will enjoy it.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: ktpickle
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a small, easy to use camera that would easily fit in a pocket or small purse to take on our trip to Disney.  I found both in this camera.  The pictures came out very clear and the colors were true to life.

Reviews.Title: Simple canera, easy to use, low cost..
Reviews.Author: David R. Rehm
Reviews.Content: I bought the AX550 for about $80 and added a $7 memory card. My previous cameras were a couple of $130 Kodak M1033's (I now know why they went out of business) and a great $280 Panasonic Lumix that I dropped in a lake. With the simple shots I take, I didn't need anything more expensive than this Fujifilm. Out of the box, it's simple, intuitive and easy to set up and use. I did read the paper manual for a few tips, but probably didn't need to if I'd taken more time to play with the camera. I'm no engineer like a previous reviewer, so I don't have a particular mind set about how something should operate. I just like simple, and this camera is just that. I get good photo's that are worthy of framing, depending on the photo paper I use, up to 5X7. Anything beyond that is grainy but  that's what you get from an $80 camera. The movie mode works well and is easy to figure out. Given the cost, it's hard for me to criticize the camera, except to say it's a bit thicker than some and it's slick....hard to hold onto sometimes, but that's a problem I see with most small cameras. Someday there will be a rugged outdoor version that has a rubber-like coating and then I'll be happy. A positive about this model is that it takes AA batteries, inexpensive to replace and available at grocery stores and gas stations everywhere. So, for a simple, decent camera that does not cost much, it's been a good choice for me. I read that some reviewers got a bad AX550, units that had out-of-the-box problems. All I can say is it happens from time to time, but if the manufacturer or the seller warranties it, then it'll all work out. I tried it with Kodak and they still sent bad stuff, so I know it does not always work for the consumer. All in all, I believe this camera is a good one, considering the cost. Namaste....now go take some pictures.

Reviews.Title: It's not a Nikon D700, but it gets the job done.
Reviews.Author: gaingreene
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera for a decent price! I have bulky professional equipment and don't feel like lugging it across the country for lollapalooza in a few days, besides they wouldn't let me through the gates with my big rig. But Jimminey Christmas this thing has 16mp. Just a few years ago, you couldn't buy a 10mp camera for under $1000. If you are expecting the quality of say a Nikon D700 you will be sorely disappointed. It takes pictures, which is the main goal right? And you don't have to take out a loan at the local S&L; which are being put out of business by Chase and Citibank to get it, by the way.If you are mainly taking pictures at family events or at the club with your girls, then you really don't need more than this. Sure there are better "built" cameras out there, but why bother unless you are one of those types of people that have to have the latest and greatest even if your main shooting style is "Auto." Simple, well constructed and affordable!If you need all the bells and whistles in a point and shoot, then you are probably trying to impress someone who really doesn't care. Namaste all you shutterbugs :-)

Reviews.Title: Gets the job done
Reviews.Author: Jagadeesh K. Venugopal
Reviews.Content: This is an economy camera but it has three things going for it. First, the photos are quite decent for regular snapshotting. Low light performance is adequate. Second, it is tiny, and uses AA batteries, so it is a great travel companion. Third, the price is great! Never worry about losing an expensive camera again.I bought three of these. One for myself, one for my parents, and yet another for the in-laws. Build quality was fine on all three. Granted its all plastic, but I can see it lasting five or more years if treated well.

Reviews.Title: Cost Alone!
Reviews.Author: MOOGG "Happy Mom"
Reviews.Content: I snagged this for $39.99 on Black Friday - after owning 3 now broken very expensive cameras, it's a 5 based on cost and ease of use - I just want a few memories, I'm not a photographer! I like that it's AA and don't have to worry about recharing before I head out to XYZ!Happy to see positive reviews.

Reviews.Title: Very Small Compact Camera.
Reviews.Author: Traveler4632
Reviews.Content: Good all purpose compact camera with all the gadgets you need. I was impressed with the controls and quality of the camera.

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: Skip
Reviews.Content: Not bad for a 16mp camera for the price, especially since it offers the freedom of using AA batteries. Thing is, to switch to movie mode takes going into the menu option.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: dantheman
Reviews.Content: the camera is great very good pics and the video feature is wonderful.I keep it with me at all times i, have taken quite a few very good pictures with it allready.

Reviews.Title: Easy picture taking
Reviews.Author: Theodore W. Sink Jr. "tedlines"
Reviews.Content: The functions are great for a cheap camera, but the lens quality is lacking. You don't get the definition you get with Nikon or Cannon lenses. Oh, and I love the fact that it takes standard batteries.

Reviews.Title: Great cheap camera
Reviews.Author: Tess
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because you can set it to not use the flash when it first comes on and it stays off even when you turn it off and back on again. I like being able to turn the camera on and taking shots on the go. It focuses fast and has a digital image stabilizer that helps my hand shakes. I like being able to get batteries anywhere and using it in a hurry. It has lots of settings and you can crop and save your photos instantly. Movies, panoramic and you can mark and prepare your photos for Facebook too.The downside to this camera is it really uses batteries when you are using the flash. Be prepared to buy batteries and enjoy a great little camera.

Reviews.Title: This the best little camera
Reviews.Author: Betty
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a easy to use camera that took good pictures.  This little gem takes beautiful pictures and is so easy to use.I would recommend this camera for new users and anyone who is looking for a smaller camera to take on trips to an amusement park. I Love this camera!

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Crystal
Reviews.Content: Bought this Camera as a gift for my Mom for Christmas and came in plently of time!Excellent condition! Got great ratings and good, affordable price!Overall a great buy!

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera, great price
Reviews.Author: NMull
Reviews.Content: I really do like this camera. It is your typical point and shoot, but there are also many settings that can be used, depending on your lighting situation. It works well and when you zoom all the way, it is clear (as long as you lightly tap the shutter button to make sure it is in focus first.) Read the directions and play around with the camera to figure out it's functions. I highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: First digital camera purchase
Reviews.Author: DCGUY
Reviews.Content: This is the first digital camera that I bought after having used 35mm, 126 cartridges (Instamatic camera) and disc film cameras going back to the 1960s.  It is very small and fits in your shirt pocket and can take digital prints and movies.  It was very easy to use straight out from the package.  There is a 2.7 inch LCD screen for viewing the area to be shot and also to scroll through the menu options for the camera settings.  The camera has 5x zoom feature for close ups.  It also has a scene recognition feature that can be used to take photos.  I used the camera on a vacation trip and it took photos with good resolution (taking photos in low light did not come out too well).  The camera uses two AA size batteries and the power drainage from taking quite a few photos and leaving it in the camera for over a month can require a new set of replacements.  If you do remove them to save power, remember that the date/time settings will need to be readjusted.  Lithium-ion batteries are probably the best if you want a power source that will last longer.  The camera was very easy to use and is a good entry level camera to the world of digital photography.  I purchased mine during a Black Friday sale for $39.99.  And that was less than the price of my previous 35mm camera from the 1990s (with less features too).  I later also purchased the Fuji camera that uses lithium-ion batteries that has similar features as this model.  That model, JX580, cost $59 during a liquidation sale.

Reviews.Title: AX560 great general purpose camera but energy problem
Reviews.Author: Mark Once
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera from a box store because I wanted small enough to put in a convoy pocket for every day use. This is a good camera for general use. It takes good general use photos in a variety of conditions. My one gripe is battery life. It seems to have a vampire attribute that sucks a battery dry in about 4 weeks with little use (10-20 photo). I'd give it a five if it wasn't for that problem.

Reviews.Title: FUJIFILMFINEPIXAX550DIGITAL CAMERA
Reviews.Author: lawrence s. bella
Reviews.Content: I VE HAD BIG CAMERAS IN THE PAST.THE FUJIFILM PIXAX500 DIGITAL CAMERA IS SMALL ENOUGH TO  CARRY WITH YOU AT ALL TIMES. IT DOES MORE THAN SOME OF THE BIG CAMERAS.THE PICTURE'S ARE VERY SHARP AND CLEAR.I HAD A FUJI CAMERA 30 YEARS AGO AND LOVED IT. THATS  WHY I CHOSE FUJI OVER THE BIG NAME CAMERAS.THE PRICE WAS EXCELLENT FOR ME.I WOULD RECOMMEND THIS CAMERA TO ANY ONE JUST STARTING OUT.LAWRENCE S.BELLA

Reviews.Title: Christmas Gift for My Daughter
Reviews.Author: DCB
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for my daughter for Christmas.  She hasn't used it very much since she usually uses her iPhone to take pictures, but she loves it so far.  It does take very nice photos, and the color is very true to life, which I really like.  I purchased this camera for her because my first digital camera was a FujiFilm camera and I loved it.  I had it for quite a few years before I needed another; I'm hoping this one is as good as mine was.

Reviews.Title: Fujifilm FinePix AX550 Digital Camera.
Reviews.Author: Eagleye
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice camera, easy to operate, not hard to setup. Takes great pics, the zoom is good. Small in size.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: It takes good and excellent pictures. It does require any complicated settings. Good both outdoor and indoor activities. Simple to handle.

Reviews.Title: Luvin my Camera
Reviews.Author: Rebecca S.
Reviews.Content: I love my new fujifilm finepix camera. I love taking pictures with it and I love how they turn out after I print them out.

Reviews.Title: lo mejor
Reviews.Author: monty
Reviews.Content: la camara muy buena es lo mejor que se puede encontrar mas nada excelente flaz la nitides es de lo mejor tiene una resolución de lo mejor

Reviews.Title: At random, makes lines across the photos
Reviews.Author: Paula L Galbraith
Reviews.Content: When it is working normally, it is a great little camera. BUT, at random, for no reason I can fathom, my pictures have a horizontal line across them. Not ALL pix, just say 2 or 3 in a group of 50. And, of course, it is always the pix I wanted the most to be great. So I have started taking multiples of those shots to make sure I get a good one. The other problem I have is that the background looks abnormally red. I have to go into my computer program and take the red out - a lot of the time. So I am not sure it is worth even the reduced price considering all the time I spend fixing poor photos.

Reviews.Title: Good camera but...
Reviews.Author: MomOfFive
Reviews.Content: I'm not a big fan of the way you switch from picture to movie. My previous 2 Fuji cameras had a switch on top that you rotate from setting to setting. This one you have to go to the menu, then select a different setting. It's not terrible, just more time consuming, when you're trying to quickly get a movie of your silly 1 year old!

Reviews.Title: Really surprised
Reviews.Author: thedest
Reviews.Content: I forgot my usual point and shoot when I went to my 40 yr high school reunion.  I went to the big chain that starts with a W to buy a cheap camera and the lady in the camera dept recommended it. This was a surprise in itself because she was very helpful.  I am amazed at how good it is.  I really love the flash which is very fast with almost no delay.  Pictures are great.  Exposure was off slightly in a few but this happens with my Canon point and shoot too.  If you want a small point and shoot that you don't have to worry about losing or breaking, this is it.  Also love the AA batteries.

Reviews.Title: A fine camera
Reviews.Author: KSArnold
Reviews.Content: This is a good little camera.  It does not have as high a number of mega pixels as newer cameras but it takes good pictures.  A small camera but a big screen to check the pictures.  It also has the great motion panorama feature that I love.

Reviews.Title: given as a gift
Reviews.Author: wrenchman
Reviews.Content: The person I gave this camera to said they loved it. I saw some of the pictures they took and they were as good a my H2O proof Pentax point and shoot.

Reviews.Title: Excellent value for the money.
Reviews.Author: Experienced photographer
Reviews.Content: I was on a cruise and my Kodak digital camera died. We docked in Puerto Rico that night and there was a CVS at the dock. This camera was on sale for $75.00. I bought it in a pinch and it takes terrific pictures for the price. The panoramic feature is a great bonus. We just took it on three weeks in London, Spain and Portugal because it was small and fits in the pocket (rather than lug my big heavy SLR.) The outdoor and flash photos are great. The indoor available light photos can be a bit fuzzy if you use the zoom or if your hand is not 100% steady. A lot of camera for the price.

Reviews.Title: FUJI AWFUL
Reviews.Content: bought this camera  broke within 2 months-  sent to Fuji to repair. The had the balls to tell me nothing wrong- and replaced the batteries???  what. here it is 6 months later, and now I cant even get a picture- it does not hold a charge for nothing--  this company is lousy-  please think twice.

Reviews.Title: Fuji AX550
Reviews.Author: Jordan Lum
Reviews.Content: Gave this to my sister to take stilsl and movies of her granddaughter and she loves it. Easy to use and great picture quality.

Reviews.Title: Very Impressed with the Customer Service
Reviews.Author: L. BRAVO "electro happy"
Reviews.Content: I can't particularly rate the product cause it never showed up on my door step. For some odd reason, and I totally don't blame this company, the package got lost somewhere between this company and my home. HOWEVER, the customer service was more than excellent! They reassured me that they would take every step necessary to track down my package. And when they put a tracer on it and it showed up that the package wasn't delivered to me, they fully refunded the money back into my account. It's a shame the product never showed up to my home, cause I would have loved to use it... but nonetheless, I'm pretty satisfied with the customer service.

Reviews.Title: Fujifilm FinePix AX550 Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Linda Hindes
Reviews.Content: Love our new Fujifilm camera.  Extra lightweight, clear, crisp photos. Great variety of detailed shots.Our last Fujifilm camera was small and great.  Made of metal so it was heavier than this plastic model.Our Great Pyrenees dog liked it too.  The teeth marks caused a few changes to the dials so we ordered this one.HIGHLY RECOMMEND for the price and beautiful photos.

Reviews.Title: Eats Batteries
Reviews.Author: Sylvia
Reviews.Content: Was very disappointed with the AA battery life. Camera worked for a while with the batteries the camera came with but they died fast and batteries got hot. I replaced with new batteries and camera still said "low batt" and then would shutdown. Replaced Batteries 3 times and camera would still shutdown. Have to send this camera back to seller.

Reviews.Title: Impossible to figure out
Reviews.Author: mlm
Reviews.Content: Based on everyone's review I decided to purchase this camera.  I just returned it today.Trying to figure out how this camera works was near impossible.  The instruction booklet was useless - no details on any of the functions.  Just pictures and what the feature was.  I went on the Fuji website to look for a manual and could not find this model.  I then called them and the very unhelpful rep said he could not find it either and did not know when it might be updated on their site.  If I wanted one I could purchase a manual.  Why would I purchase one when it should come with one or it should be available on their website.My husband is fairly good at figuring things out but was totally frustrated with this camera. When I purchased it, the store did not have one on display for me to check out.  Leads me to believe this was probably a discontinued model.Good luck if you buy it.

Reviews.Title: Out of the Box...with Errors!
Reviews.Author: Brett
Reviews.Content: This camera was shipped to me, and within 15 mins I hated it and am now writing a review 30 mins later.  I got it out of the box and immediately felt how cheap it was.  It is made almost entirely of plastic, and there is not view finder only a POOR quality LCD display.The GUI is hard to navigate, (coming from an engineer) and to top it all off the video recording mode has a purple line going from top to bottom!  There is nothing wrong with the display of the camera, it records with a vertical line in the screen when I viewed it on my laptop!  And the sound records dead air with no noise cancellation so recording in a silent room actually sounds like you are recording with a waterfall behind you and someone is physically turning a role of capture film.  AND I do not consider this camera Slim, it is over an inch thick and I feel like I would break the plastic if I were to carry it in my pocket so you are going to need a case and that is going to add to its clunkiness.If you are looking for a Cheap 16 Mega pixel Camera, this is not for you.  This is a 16MP camera but it does not have the quality that a 16MP camera should.  The processing speed of the camera is a joke, and its user interface is not intuitive.Oh and the only other "Reviewer" only has one review on Amazon, just for this camera?  Sounds like  it was a five star staged review posted by the seller, because this is not a great camera.Bottom line, Look at other Cameras.

Reviews.Title: Okay but...
Reviews.Author: Fifi
Reviews.Content: I bought this last week and it was okay for outdoors but I was not impressed with the images indoors or in low light. It also does not seem to charge from the USB but uses 2 AA batteries. I was not aware that some cameras do not charge automatically or perhaps mine is faulty. Either way it is going back.

Reviews.Title: Baffled
Reviews.Author: grammacozy62
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera from a local store, not Amazon. There is no way that I can find to get the pictures off of the camera. I live in the post-pc era. The age of cell phones,hand-helds, tablets, clouds and apps has no place to insert a CD. Its not as though I've never had a PC, I've just moved on. Is there a way to use this camera or should I round file it? Nancy Bettac Barton, grammacozy62

ProductInfo.Features:
16MP CCD
High Quality Fujinon 5x Optical Zoom Lens
2.7 inches LCD
HD Movies (720p)
2 - AA Batteries
ProductInfo.Name: Fujifilm FinePix AX550 Digital Camera
